name: Prison story (Horror)
description:
WARNING: This game includes themes of death an is a little creepy.

Prison Story (Horror) is a small project that I have been working on for the past 2 days and was originally meant to be a joke game, but then I thought "Hey, why don't I make this a fully fleshed out game" and so I did. The game right now is in it's demo stage and is still in development, so feel free to leave your feedback on the game in the comments, thanks :)

Here is some info about the game:

Programming Language - Scratch

Ported to itch using htmlifier

Version - V 2.0 Demo

Genre - Horror

Platform - Web browser
